name: 迈克尔·沃尔登
name_full: 迈克尔·沃尔登 Michael Worden
introduction: Michael Worden is an actor/writer/music supervisor based in the New York/New Jersey area.He obtained a BA in Vocal Performance from Oneonta State University and an MA in Literature with an emphasis in Adaptation Theory.Michael is a classically trained opera singer who began is acting career in musical theater, including two national tours.His Improv and comedy training includes UCB and iOWest well as Second City and Impro Theatre.
